title: Ningbo Cixi Stadium
text: Ningbo Cixi Stadium (<a href="Simplified%20Chinese">Simplified Chinese</a>: 宁波慈溪体育场) is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Cixi%20City">Cixi</a>, <a href="Ningbo">Ningbo</a>, <a href="China">China</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 16,000 people.
